website_summaries.verdict: Quality pool toys that are fun way to teach kids how to dive and swim underwater.
pros: Quality-made pool toy helps when learning to dive underwater
Includes 3 Spider-Man figures in different suits
Toys sink to the bottom slowly, perfect if you can’t go all the way down
cons: Toys are a little on the smaller side

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My three year old boy loves spiderman and these were the perfect size for his little hands. I like that they are rubber so they don't break when he is rough with them. I know they are pool toys, but they worked out perfectly as little action figures for him. By far, this was his favorite birthday gift! I'm thinking of buying another set for his cousins because they always want to play with them as well!
customer_reviews.author: MyBryan

customer_reviews.title: Pool toy...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn’t read that they were POOL TOYS, but my 4 year old still loves them. So the idea is they sink and you can dive and get them but they also work as little figures to play with.
customer_reviews.author: DallasAmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! These don’t mold, durable and easy to clean. I have bought these 4 times because we love them as a family for pool, bath and normal play time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “I love them!“ yells my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old dove for these in the pool and played with them for over an hour today. Happy kid = Happy mom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Diving Toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this! He uses it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as expected
customer_reviews.text: For pool toys they are a little small and not as heavy as expected. Yet the kids didn't notice and the look is super cool.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: My son loved them
customer_reviews.text: Great pool toys. As my son is learning to swim these have been great at giving him. Target to swim to the stairs. Would work great as a dive toy as well for those with older kids
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but fun
customer_reviews.text: Priced a but high, but for the superman fan, fun to be able to play in the pool with them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schuppe

customer_reviews.title: To Dive For
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who's become obsessed with swimming. Perfect time to buy Spider-Man ones since the movie released. There a rubber like material so you can easily grab them under water. Takes a little time to sink but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit at the pool
customer_reviews.text: My boys loved playing with these guys at the pool. They are waterproof so you can bring these into the pool or bath.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these - in and out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: Kellsingz

customer_reviews.title: exactly what a little boy wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Product was what we were searching for. Made someone very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to dive for these!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren enjoy diving for these! Will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: nylucky5707

customer_reviews.title: Fun dive toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toys for the kids to dive for. No fading this season with lots on sun on them sitting on the pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Worth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these. He not only uses them inside the pool but outside as well
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Mom

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These have been out all summer and still look new. The kids love them, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmalinnie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There nice colorful figures , but there very small . only thing I did'nt like about them .
customer_reviews.author: Pegi

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toys
customer_reviews.text: The Spiderman sinkers are great -- a new twist on an old toy! My grandson loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy kilduff

product_meta.title: SwimWays Marvel Spider-Man Dive Characters
product_meta.description: Fans of Ultimate Spider-Man will love this collection of Marvel Spider-Man Dive Characters from SwimWays! Styles include Spider-Man, Iron Spider, and Miles Morales. These Web Warriors are ready to help your little superhero develop strong swimming skills as they swim underwater to retrieve these fun dive sticks. Makes a great Spider-Man collectible, too! Three characters in every pack, one of each character. Colors and styles may vary. For children ages 5 and older.
feature_bullets: Three pack of dive sticks shaped like Spider-Man Web Warriors!
Watch as each dive character sinks to the bottom, waiting to be retrieved.
Great dive toys for swim practice as the bright colors are easy to spot.
Each pack includes: 1 Spider-Man, 1 Iron Spider, and 1 Miles Morales dive character.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
